description: Sustainable UPF 50+ protection that you'll want to live in all season long. Built with 100% recycled fabric, Mountain Hardwear's Sunblocker™ Hoody features melange textures in muted earth tones so you can be at one with your environment, whether you're roaming far and wide through the backcountry or keeping cool with friends at the river.
name: Mountain Hardwear Sunblocker Hoody - Mens
